summary: Bouquet Collection page code and image mapping were updated to render 6 cards and point bouquet images to generated soft-white assets. However, the diff does not show the required generated image assets being added, and at least one product description does not match the requested copy exactly. Several unrelated catalog image mappings and metadata/state files were also modified beyond the Bouquet Collection requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure bouquet card content matches the provided descriptions and pricing exactly (including the specific short descriptions).
missing_requirements.reason: The Pipe Cleaner Flower Bouquet description does not match the requested text/copy; it uses a generic placeholder description instead of the provided copy set for each bouquet card.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/BouquetCollectionPage.tsx (Pipe Cleaner Flower Bouquet: description: 'Unique and creative designs.')

missing_requirements.requirement: Store 6 generated premium-edited bouquet images in frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the Bouquet Collection uses these generated images.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references generated images under /assets/generated, but the diff shows no new static assets added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the requirement to store/use the generated images is not evidenced as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added mappings for Polaroid Bouquet images, Frames & Memory Keepsakes images, Bookmarks image, Customized Cards image, and a Cute Essentials generated image array.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request was specifically about Bouquet Collection and only allowed changes to other collection pages/mappings if needed to support Bouquet Collection images; these additional mappings appear unrelated to supporting Bouquet Collection images.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the build requirements; these are auxiliary state/summary updates not mentioned in the BuildRequest.
